citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:20 am on
2/27/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the kennel door, knocking on the
house door, honking the horn, calling the licensee's phone number and leaving a message, and by calling the given
facility representative who was not available to facilitate an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals,
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:20 am on 
2/27/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the kennel door, knocking on the 
house door, honking the horn, calling the licensee's phone number and leaving a message, and by calling the given 
facility representative who was not available to facilitate an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, 
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
